thread.title: 23 To Channel Inner Ariana Grande
thread.title_full: 23 Products To Channel Your Inner Ariana Grande

author: leidyvaldez
title: 23 To Channel Inner Ariana Grande
text:
View this image ›
BuzzFeed ID: 10316468 1. A fragrance that’s “Sweet Like Candy”, although let’s set things straight, you’re not one to mess with. Get it from Ulta for $39.00 . ulta.com / Via Ulta.com , ulta.com / Via ulta.com Get the rollerball for $20.00 or the 1.0 oz for $39.00 from Ulta.
ID: 10280995 2. This mask for when you’re feeling Dangerous Woman af. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $10.28 .
ID: 10308022 3. This sweatshirt with a fresh type of flow. View this image ›
arianagrande.com / Via arianagrande.com Get it from Ariana Grande’s merch store for $60.00 .
ID: 10280074 4. This black skater skirt to confidently slay in. NEW YORK, NY - DECEMBER 09: Recording artist Ariana Grande performs onstage during Z100's Jingle Ball 2016 at Madison Square Garden on December 9, 2016 in New York, New York. (Photo by Mike Coppola/Getty Images for iHeart) tobi.com / Via tobi.com , Mike Coppola / Getty Get it from Tobi for $26.00 .
ID: 10280106 5. The throw pillow cover of any sassy queen’s dreams. View this image ›
society6.com / Via society6.com Get it from Society6 for $20.00 .
ID: 10280129 6. Nail decals that scream ARIANATOR. View this image ›
etsy.com / Via etsy.com Get them from Etsy for $8.00.
ID: 10280142 7. A sweatshirt that is true to who you are. View this image ›
hottopic.com / Via hottopic.com Get it from Hot Topic for $30.00 .
ID: 10280131 8. These wireless headphones to jam to Side to Side while on the exercise bike. brookstone.com / Via brookstone.com Get it from Brookstone for $149.99 .
ID: 10281732 9. Hairspray to keep your high pony intact. ulta.com / Via ulta.com , Giphy / Via giphy.com Get it from Ulta for $17.95 .
ID: 10280285 10. A sexy bralette because you’re fearless and you love your body no matter what. View this image ›
hm.com / Via hm.com Get it at H&M for $14.99 .
ID: 10280203 11. White trousers , because look at these things. Singer Ariana Grande arrives at the 2016 American Music Awards in Los Angeles, California, U.S., November 20, 2016. REUTERS/Danny Moloshok us.asos.com / Via asos.com , Danny Moloshok / Reuters Get these from ASOS for $43.00 .
ID: 10280282 12. A comfy oversized hoodie to go over your bralette, in case it gets chilly. Get it from H&M for $19.99 . hm.com / Via hm.com , Giphy / Via giphy.com Get it from H&M for $19.99 .
ID: 10280211 13. Kat Von D tattoo liner for a flawless wing every time. Get it from Sephora for $20.00 . Giphy / Via giphy.com Get it from Sephora for $20.00 .
ID: 10280287 14. A pair of chic sunnies . (Can’t see the haters with these on). View this image ›
amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get these on Amazon for $17.98 .
ID: 10280319 15. This cute choker set . urbanoutfitters.com / Via urbanoutfitters.com Get it at Urban Outfitters for $26.00 .
ID: 10280329 16. A pretty little backpack to carry all your essentials. nastygal.com / Via nastygal.com Get it at Nastygal for $55.00 .
ID: 10280370 17. BADgal mascara for fun and flirty lashes. Get it from Sephora for $19.00 . sephora.com / Via sephora.com , Mac / Via giphy.com Get it from Sephora for $19.00 .
ID: 10280302 18. A stylish blush colored bomber . BEVERLY HILLS, CA - AUGUST 02: Actress Ariana Grande speaks onstage at the 'Hairspray Live!' panel discussion during the NBCUniversal portion of the 2016 Television Critics Association Summer Tour at... Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images Get it at ASOS for $39.00 .
ID: 10301738 19. And a hat to match. View this image ›
sosorella.com / Via sosorella.com Get it at Sosorella for $30.00 .
ID: 10280347 20. These Mac Lip colors to choose from depending on your mood. maccosmetics.com / Via maccosmetics.com Get Deep Cool Pink or Deep Cool Plum at MAC for $17.00 .
ID: 10280303 21. A travel makeup pouch that states nothing but the truth. View this image ›
etsy.com / Via etsy.com Get it from Etsy for $19.99 .
ID: 10308546 22. Boots that you can make a statement in… and use to kick misogyny in the ass with. Giphy / Via giphy.com Get them at DSW for $79.95 .
ID: 10280397 23. And last but not least, cat ears that say you are one fierce and confident feline. etsy.com / Via etsy.com , Giphy / Via giphy.com Get them on Etsy for $19.92 .
